1.content:
It seemed the weather was in contrast with the mood of Monster High's newest student. The sky was mostly cloudy, but the sun shined through to comfortable levels. Students were enjoying the weather, while you sit in the vehicle, self driving and bigger on the inside.

"Patch, we all agreed that until things calm down, this is the best option for your safety." said the holographic head of your god father.

"Sure, living a lie and looking over my back for the rest of my life sounds like fun." you reply as you get out of the car, you communication going internal to infrasonic.

"Oh quit bitching, you graduated the academy, so you can more than handle yourself. This is also for you to enjoy an experience that we have mostly lost."

"That would be?" you reply.

"The experience of interacting with others your age, more or less and having real friends, weird sex and all. Now only Headmistress Bloodgood knows the full story, so stick with the cover story, find some friends, and use plenty of lube."

You ponder this as you enter the school, trying to avoid any attention. Yet you get a few stares for being the new kid, and not a inter dimensional refugee. As you get to your first class, you find a seat next to someone you recognize from your research on Monster High.

It is
1.title: New Student, New Life

info.brief_description: You attend Monster High for a fresh start and finding love. You past can still haunt you.
info.description:
You step into the role of Patch Sands, a normie/Human attending Monster High. While everyone believes you are from out of state, in truth you are from a parallel universe, one where monsters don't exist but is far ahead of the current time. In your homeline, your parents are responsible for several horrible events then took their own lives to avoid punishment. The masses demanded someone pay for the crimes and demand you stand trial for the crimes. In secret, your god parents sent you to the monster high universe to hide and start a new life.

Rules:
+Sex is allowed and encouraged for all orientations, just try not to break up any canon couples.
+Fetishes can be allowed such as vore, just ensure there is a romantic edge to it.
+Patch can die, but return by downloading into a new body.
+Attempt to create paragraphs or solid entries.
+Have fun
info.pretty_title: Monster High: Requiem for a Scream
